mapper.select: select emo_id as emoId, emo_code as emoCode, emo_name as emoName, company, emo_date as emoDate from emo_mst where emo_code = #{emoCode}
select image_id as imageId, image_seq as imageSeq, emo_code as emoCode, save_name as saveName, origin_name as originName from emo_image where emo_code = #{emoCode} order by emoCode, imageSeq
select min(image_id) as imageId, image_seq as imageSeq, emo_code as emoCode, save_name as saveName, origin_name as originName from emo_image where emo_code = #{emoCode}
